derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, named in honour of Dr Alexander Garden (1730–91), Scottish naturalist

entry.def: A gardenia is a type of large, white, or yellow flower with a very pleasant smell. A gardenia is also the bush on which these flowers grow.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various shrubs and small trees of the genus Gardenia having large fragrant white or yellow flowers
